title: Hugs
description: Hugs tells about a group of friends, all but one of whom is having a bad day and needs a hug. The unexpected conclusion ends the book on an uplifting note. Hugs reinforces the validity of both good and bad feelings and the importance of receiving hugs for either kind.
reviewWords: enormous, favorite, giant, horrible, huge, miserable, rotten, terrible
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause and effect relationships
grammar: Adjectives                : Recognize adjectives as words that describe
